title: My Pixel suddenly has multiple functions failing. Need help trouble shooting.
content:
My Pixel has been malfunctioning recently. Here is a list of the reoccurring problems.

-"System UI not responding error" when accessing phone app
-"Phone not responding error" when accessing phone app
-Phone freezing/crashing when accessing phone app
-Microphone not working for calls/Google assistant/video or audio recording
-Receiver speaker not working
-Headphone jack not working

I researched these problems and did the suggested trouble shooting. I first did a Safe Boot to see if the problems we're caused by a 3rd party app. The function was restored briefly, but eventually the problems reoccurred. I then preformed a factory reset. I didn't log in to my Google account during setup and the errors persisted. I have taken my Pixel to a local ubreakifix authorized store to have a diagonostic test run. All the parts appeared to be functioning and the worker suggested it was an app. 

These problems will sometimes disappear after the trouble shooting/resetting/safe mode/factory reset/ etc, but eventually come back. It seemed to begin occuring recently after an update to the OS back in early Jan. I also had the battery replaced in December at the same ubreakifix store. The old battery was no longer holding a charge. My phone is out-of-warrenty too. I am just trying to provide as much information, I do not know if this is applicable to the problems though. 

Any suggestions or help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
